prompt.preamble:
We are testing a system for understanding people's interest in reading different kinds of online articles.
For example, you might be interested in articles about some topics, but not about others.
prompt.task_description: your preferences of what kinds of online articles you would like to read
prompt.final: In the final part of the study, you will give feedback on a test set of article headline and descriptions, which will enable us to see how well a chatbot reading your responses has learned what you like and dislike.
prompt.evaluation: Please indicate whether you would like to read the following articles: "yes" if you would, "no" if you would not.

conversation_history.message:
Are you interested in the following article? Website: msn.com
Title: What the Protests Breaking Out All Over the World Have in Common
Description: Millions of people are taking to the streets. It might just be the beginning.
Hmm it isn't really my cup of tea. I would like something a little bit more local!

Are you interested in the following article? Website: msn.com
Title: 2019 Los Angeles Auto Show Preview
Description: Get ready for the 2019 Los Angeles Auto Show
That isn't too bad but I don't really care about cars at all.

Are you interested in the following article? Website: msn.com
Title: Fashion hits and misses from the 2019 Hollywood Film Awards
Description: Check out the best and worst fashion of the 2019 Hollywood Film Awards
Haha I don't really like fashion either! Do you have any articles about sports by chance?

Are you interested in the following article? Website: msn.com
Title: Patrick Day boxed for the love of the sport, and unfortunately paid the ultimate price
Description:
Haha I guess I don't really like boxing much, do you have a different one?

Are you interested in the following article? Website: msn.com
Title: 27 Things No One Tells You About Having Diabetes
Description: Discover the realities of living with diabetes that nobody tells you until you're diagnosed and actually experiencing them.
Health isn't really sports. Anything about basketball or the like?

Are you interested in the following article? Website: msn.com
Title: Central Arkansas vs. Duke Men's Basketball Highlights (2019-20)
Description: -
Sure but that is just some random game! What about the NFL?

Are you interested in the following article? Website: msn.com
Title: If You're Not Serving Mac 'n Cheese This Thanksgiving, You're Missing Out
Description: Think outside the box this Thanksgiving.
Haha not even close! NFL articles please!

Are you interested in the following article? Website: msn.com
Title: Under-the-Radar Winter Destinations for Whole Family
Description: These underrated places are great for a winter vacation
I like vacations. Show me something else about sports.

Are you interested in the following article? Website: msn.com
Title: A new Microsoft cloud category to watch: The Microsoft 365 number
Description: Microsoft doesn't break out Microsoft 365 as a separate category in its earnings reports. But indicators that the suite is starting to gain traction are evident in its Q1 FY'20 report.

evaluation_results.sample:
Website Name: New York Times
Title: In Norway, the Electric Vehicle Future Has Already Arrived
Description: About 80 percent of new cars sold in Norway are battery-powered. As a result, the air is cleaner, the streets are quieter and the grid hasn’t collapsed. But problems with unreliable chargers persist.
evaluation_results.label: no

feedback.feedback_other: I hope my information was helpful! I tried to interact with the chatbot in a way that felt natural but I felt like it didn't understand me well. If I were to do something like this again, it is on me to try and adapt a bit in my requests.
